title: The matchstick animations of Tomohiro Okazaki

images.alt: Overhead view of a match resting on two large paper circle cutouts matching the color of the match's head and stick

description: Tomohiro Okazaki has a long running series of eye-popping stop-motion animations using three simple ingredients: a matchstick, some paper, and a magic red dot.
image: ![Overhead view of a match resting on two large paper circle cutouts matching the color of the match's head and stick](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3238096/160138582-013cc4d4-8a85-4b72-8688-52e87646b68d.jpg)
